item.description: I am a political scientist who takes an interest in political behavior, public opinion, and elections, with a main methodological focus on experimental studies. Currently I lead the projects Can Fair Decision Making Procedures Increase The Legitimacy of Democracies?, and Democratic innovation in practice. Together with Yvette Peters, I coordinate the research group on Political Behavior and Democracy at the Digital Social Science Core Facilities – DIGSSCORE.
